person.persName: John C. Coon (Cleveland, Ohio, lawyer U.S. Army Paymaster)

body.p: Cleveland, Ohio, lawyer and U.S. Army Paymaster. Ballston Spa, New York native. Son of Matthew Coon and Alba Cinda Lyon Coon. Married to Martha Coon. Father of George W. Coon. Lawyer in Cleveland in 1860. Served in the U.S. Army as Paymaster from 1861 to 1865.
